thread.title: Door Opens to Gene Editing in Embryos
thread.title_full: Door Opens to Gene Editing in Embryos - WSJ

author: Amy Dockser Marcus
title: Door Opens to Gene Editing in Embryos
text:
Clinical trials involving the editing of genes in sperm, eggs and early-stage embryos could be permitted under certain conditions, the National Academies of Sciences and the National Academy of Medicine recommended Tuesday in a long-awaited report.
Once technical questions are resolved, clinical trials could start with extensive oversight, the report said. But the report urged limiting trials to the “most compelling circumstances,”...
